name: code-weaver
description: Seamlessly connect your development environment with AI assistants. This extension provides smart code analysis, AI-powered suggestions, and direct integration with Claude and other LLMs to enhance your coding workflow. Features include contextual code completion, intelligent refactoring suggestions, and collaborative problem-solving through a dedicated webview interface.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
